alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:34PM CDT until May 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SALINE COUNTY... At 1033 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of New Cambria to near Smolan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, New Cambria, Falun, Bridgeport, Salina Airport and Kipp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
